body.bibl: Harvey, Susan Ashbrook, Reyhan Durmaz, Michael L. Payne, Daniel Picus, and Noah Tetenbaum. Three Persian Martyr Acts: The Acts of Miles, Bishop of Susa, the Priest Abursam, and Deacon Sinai, The Martyrdom of Zebina and His Companions, and The Martyrdom of the Forty Martyrs of Beth Kashkraye. Persian Martyr Acts in Syriac: Text and Translation 9. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2023.
